title: coinratinternal@gmail.com
author: coinratinternal@gmail.com
content: Telegram bot that provides crucial information to conduct due diligence on crypto tokensTTF crypto project is a Telegram bot that provides crucial information to conduct due diligence on crypto tokens. The bot actively monitors blockchain activity and sends alerts to keep investors informed, promoting transparency and building trust between founders and users.Additionally, the token has undergone a comprehensive audit by SafuAudit, which is available at https://safuaudit.com/0x1400AB77651a26104239FF4a900073Dc9Fcd16a7. Furthermore, the LP lock link is https://www.pinksale.finance/pinklock/record/1080814?chain=BSC , More details can be found here : https://icogems.com/coin/TTF-coin

comments.author: pingu39
comments.body: What is TTF project/token.Can you tell me more about your project, what is its concept and essence?Can you show me the whitepaper, website, twitter.More info is necessary.
